title: The Thermostat Tamperer
setting: BrightPath Financial, main office, Thursday 7:30 AM
premise: Someone cranked the office thermostat to 95 degrees overnight, warping furniture and damaging electronics. The thermostat panel in the utility hallway was manually changed at some point Wednesday evening.

suspects.name: Donna Mercer
suspects.motive: Campaigning to relocate the office to a newer building and wants to prove this one is failing
suspects.alibi: I left the office at 6 PM and drove to my daughter's dance recital at the community center. The recital started at 7 PM and ended at 9 PM. Then I drove straight home.

suspects.name: Craig Nolan
suspects.motive: Constantly complains the office is freezing and has argued about the thermostat for months
suspects.alibi: I was at a client dinner at Harborview Grill from 7 PM until about 9:30 PM Wednesday. My client and I split the bill. I took a cab home afterward and was in bed by 10 PM.

suspects.name: Wendy Cho
suspects.motive: Being relocated to a smaller office and furious about the downgrade
suspects.alibi: I stayed late reviewing regulatory filings until about 9 PM. Then I walked to the parking garage and drove home. I live about twenty minutes away. I went right to sleep.

suspects.name: Pete Sandoval
suspects.motive: Was written up for thermostat complaints and wants to prove the system needs an upgrade he requested
suspects.alibi: I finished my shift at 5 PM and went to the hardware store for a home project. I was there until 6 PM then went straight home. My wife and I watched TV all evening.

clues.title: Security Camera Review
clues.content: The lobby camera shows Wendy leaving at 9:05 PM. After that, one person entered the building at 9:40 PM using a badge and left at 9:55 PM.

clues.title: Badge Entry Log
clues.content: The 9:40 PM badge entry belongs to Craig Nolan. The utility hallway where the thermostat is located is just fifteen feet from the lobby entrance.

clues.title: Restaurant Closing Time
clues.content: Harborview Grill's posted hours show they close at 9 PM on Wednesdays. Craig claimed dinner lasted until 9:30 PM, but the restaurant would have been closed by then.

hints.text: Pay attention to the timing of each suspect's evening plans on Wednesday.
Do the claimed dining hours actually match the restaurant's operating schedule that night?
